trans-unit.source: Represents an extension added to a <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> within an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 表示添加到 XML Web services 中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.Binding" /> 的扩展。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies that the data transmission will use the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 此类指定数据传输，将使用 SOAP 协议版本 1.1。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 有关指定的 XML Web 服务协议的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" /> 类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for the standard protocol specifying HTTP transmission of SOAP data.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 SOAP 数据的 HTTP 传输的标准协议的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http/".
trans-unit.target: 字段值是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http/"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI for the XML namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" /> 类的 XML 命名空间的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The field value is "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/".
trans-unit.target: 字段值是"http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于通过使用 SOAP 协议 1.1 版来传输数据的绑定架构。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object that represents the binding schema that is to be used to transmit data by using the SOAP protocol version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> 对象，表示用于通过使用 SOAP 协议 1.1 版来传输数据的绑定架构。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of SOAP binding used by the current <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定当前 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding" /> 所使用的 SOAP 绑定的类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingStyle" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Document" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="Document" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URI with the specification for HTTP transmission of SOAP data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 SOAP 数据的 HTTP 传输规范的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A string value representing the URI for the specification for data transmission by means of SOAP.
trans-unit.target: 字符串值，表示使用 SOAP 的数据传输规范的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: This required property value will generally be the same as that of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.HttpTransport> field.
trans-unit.target: 这所必需的属性值通常是相同的<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBinding.HttpTransport>字段。

trans-unit.source: However, this property value can be any URI for data-transmission specifications, for example, SMTP or FTP.
trans-unit.target: 但是，此属性的值可以是任何有关数据传输规范，例如，SMTP 或 FTP 的 URI。

trans-unit.source: SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#2
trans-unit.target: SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#2
